publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-150 Mr Tom McCabe: Designation of Lead Committees—That the Parliament agrees the following designations of lead committees: The Health and Community Care Committee to consider The Food (Animals and Animal Products from Belgium) (Emergency Control) (No. 2) (Scotland) Order 1999 (SSI 1999/32); The Health and Community Care Committee to consider The Food Animal Feedstuffs from Belgium (Control) (No. 2) (Scotland) Regulations 1999 (SSI 1999/33).
